verse: विष्णु भक्ति समायुक्तो मिथ्याचारोऽप्यनाश्रमी । पुनाति सकलान् लोकान् सहस्रांशुरिवोदितः॥ इति।

terms.अनाश्रमी:: one who does not follow the prescribed spiritual path, one who is not a renunciate

meaning: Meaning:Accompanied by devotion to Vishnu, even someone with improper behavior who is not a renunciate can purify all beings like the radiant sun. This is the end.
